description: Enable powerful web search and content extraction capabilities. Perform web searches and scrape webpage content seamlessly to enhance your applications with real-time data.

serperApiKey.description: The API key for the Serper MCP server.

tools.name: google_search
tools.description: Tool to perform web searches via Serper API and retrieve rich results. It is able to retrieve organic search results, people also ask, related searches, and knowledge graph.

q.description: Search query string (e.g., 'artificial intelligence', 'climate change solutions')

gl.description: Optional region code for search results in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format (e.g., 'us', 'gb', 'de')

hl.description: Optional language code for search results in ISO 639-1 format (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'fr')

tbs.description: Time-based search filter ('qdr:h' for past hour, 'qdr:d' for past day, 'qdr:w' for past week, 'qdr:m' for past month, 'qdr:y' for past year)

page.description: Page number of results to return (default: 1)

cache.description: View Google's cached version of a specific URL (e.g., 'example.com/page')

inurl.description: Search for pages with word in URL (e.g., 'download', 'tutorial')

exclude.description: Terms to exclude from search results as comma-separated string (e.g., 'spam,ads', 'beginner,basic')

intitle.description: Search for pages with word in title (e.g., 'review', 'how to')

location.description: Optional location for search results (e.g., 'SoHo, New York, United States', 'California, United States')

autocorrect.description: Whether to autocorrect spelling in query

tools.name: scrape
tools.description: Tool to scrape a webpage and retrieve the text and, optionally, the markdown content. It will retrieve also the JSON-LD metadata and the head metadata.

url.description: The URL of the webpage to scrape.
